EmailTemplate.name: 18-GEPS TO-Partner-Email-Video email-T001ZR.Email 5
EmailTemplate.subject: What’s in your toolbox?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Nokia Global Partner Program The Nokia Global Partner Program provides all the tools you need … without the hassle. One password, one-click access to the Partner Portal for the tools that can help you succeed. Simply log in to the Partner Portal and click on “Partner Tools” from the Topic Catalog main menu.
- Discover how our Business Management tools can help channel partners size market opportunities, or run a profit and loss simulation to calculate return on investment
- Explore how our Configurators, Pricing and Quotation tools can help you price Nokia products and solutions for your customers. - Learn more about our Sales and Marketing tools to support you in promoting Nokia products and solutions. - View our Certification trackers to monitor your employees’ training progress.
Contact Nokia <[[mailto:nokia_global_partner_communications@nokia.com?subject=I%20have%20a%20question%20about%20Nokia%20Support%20video%20for%20partners]]> to discover what tools you may be missing out on. Nokia Partner Marketing & Communications Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
